column2: Description
Collect a jar of peanut butter
Place all materials on a clean
column3: flat surface like a kitchen counter

column2: Wash your hands with soap and water for 20 seconds and dry them
Untie or unclip the bread bag to access the bread slices
Take two slices of bread from the bag and place them on the plate
Retie or reclip the bread bag to keep the remaining bread fresh
Twist the lid of the peanut butter jar counterclockwise to open it
Use the butter knife to scoop a tablespoon of peanut butter from the jar
Spread the peanut butter evenly on one side of the first bread slice
Wipe the knife clean with a paper towel or rinse it to remove peanut butter
Twist the lid of the jelly jar counterclockwise to open it
Use the spoon to scoop a tablespoon of jelly from the jar
Spread the jelly evenly on one side of the second bread slice
Place the peanut butter side of the first slice onto the jelly side of the second slice
Gently press the slices together to ensure they stick
Use the butter knife to cut the sandwich diagonally into two triangles
Place the sandwich halves neatly on the plate
Tightly close the peanut butter and jelly jars by twisting the lids clockwise
Wipe the counter and wash the knife and spoon with soap and water
Serve the sandwich on the plate and enjoy your meal
